name: A.P. Møller - Mærsk A/S
bossPosition: Head of Public Affairs, Vice President
goal:
A.P. Møller-Mærsk A/S (Maersk) is an integrated transport & logistics company with multiple brands. Including a stand-alone Energy division, the company employs roughly 88,000 employees across operations in 130 countries.

In the fiscal year of 2016, Maersk reported a net revenue of USD 35 bn.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Internal Market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
- European Energy Policy
- European Climate Policy
- European Environmental Policy
- European Maritime Policy
- European Ports Policy
- European Logistics Policy
- European Transportation Policy
- European Customs Policy
- European Tax Policy
- European Competition Policy
- European Trade Policy
- European Company Law and Corporate Governance Policy
